FuncDef: This command configures a mapping of an IP address or subnet to a peer profile. If one peer profile is used for the entire router, it is possible to map the entire IPv4 subnet using 0.0.0.0/0.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP prefix and prefix length of the subnet.
Specifies the GTP peer profile associated with the address prefix, up to 32 characters.
